prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon with flame-like features and a mysterious aura.
I want a fire-type Pokemon that resembles a chandelier with elegant swirls.
Generate a spooky ghost Pokemon that glows in the dark and floats in the air.
Make a Pokemon inspired by a candle, featuring blue flames and ornate designs.
Imagine a ghostly being with a whimsical shape and enchanting flames emanating from it.
Design a Pokemon that combines elegance and eeriness with flickering light effects.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of a haunted chandelier with vibrant colors.
